page.title: 07Farming around King's Sutton
page.content: We rang up the three biggest local farms around King's Sutton and asked how many acres of farmland they have, what crops they grow and if they have livestock. Astrop Park Farm is 863 acres; they grow winter wheat and winter barley and they have livestock. Manor Farm said they grow wheat, barley, potatoes and rape.They have no livestock because there is not enough grass. We saw a big spraying machine spraying Kerb as a weed controller in the rape. Twyford Farms said they have grass, wheat and barley.They also have livestock such as sheep and cows.They have 1000 acres of farmland.
